purpose: To explore and demonstrate advanced techniques for improving the performance and accuracy of Retrieval-Augmented Generation systems.
principle: Combines information retrieval with generative models to provide accurate and contextually rich responses.
reusability: Can be integrated into existing RAG systems to enhance their retrieval and generation capabilities, with modular components for experimentation.
limitations: Primarily experimental with a focus on advanced techniques, may require significant customization for specific use cases.
name: RAG_Techniques
description: This repository showcases various advanced techniques for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems. RAG systems combine information retrieval with generative models to provide accurate and contextually rich responses.
highlight: Showcases advanced techniques for enhancing Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems.
